post.body: Exactly. Twhirl has forced my hand this time and i have to say i'm pretty happy with Tweetdeck so far
It's crazy, not a single sniff of a cold for aaages.....cut my hair off , then blam Cold City.
Yep, Twhirl just seems to not want to get out of bed today.
gets my vote for organising the next Web conference http://is.gd/aZsk
Indeed i am. Good result last night, Gomes pulled off some good saves, looks like he might be getting some confidence back.
def sounded that way.......
hopefully 'Arry can keep his record on returning to Upton Park up :-)
Yep should be there around 6ish. Should be a good'un
Lol hadn't watched it for a while but have fond memories of Terry sounding like he was boozed up & ripping it out of the whole thing
Nice post on Trutap by the way Tom. There were quite a few holes in the Open Gardens piece.
Littlewoods you say?? Nope afraid their pick 'n mix was just before my time. It's always been Woolies 4 me :-)
The original and best.....Pick n' Mix......just not the same in other establishments.
new FotC episode http://bit.ly/znIo but u might need 2 use http://bit.ly/4je8 to watch it as it's US only...Bastardos
Ahhh, missed the first time round , re-watching :-) Ryan Reynolds as Deadpool.....hmmm i'll keep an open mind on him.
Tnx 4 heads up on Wolverine trailer, looks awesome! Glad that Gambit & Sabretooth are introduced. Is that Blob too?
New season of FOTC coming in Jan apparently.
Will def catch u in the early New Yr . Ranked 421 at the mo woop! Have a great x mas, speak to u soon.
Had a lot of HD$ on Chris winning....was a nice surprise that it came in. Sorry i couldn't make it up to u last wk.
Happy birthday mate, hope you're having a good one!
Sadly, it's always a danger when u dunk.....the risks we take. Sturdier biscuits for a safer drunk :-)
definitely. It's a massive game full of gun-play, karma and violence. Gets my recommendation.
Happy birthday Mike, hope u have a good'un!
Hmmm Twhirl may well be working again....but i've gotten this far today with Tweetdeck . Maybe i'll go back 2 Twhirl tomorrow, maybe not.
Should have never had my hair this wk....far too cold and have been suffering since....I need more hats.
#momo social location from Priya at Flirto and troubles of not making it 2 specific. Shozu, people want co-ords of pics etc but make private
#momo the question of privacy and loc based services pops up, courtesy of @paulwalsh. Let's see the answers ....
#momo can we only dream of global flat rate data? Or is it perhaps just around the corner?
#momo. "shozu, the best way to get shit off u'r phone" classic and true
Happy slapping, there's a term I haven't heard for a while.
People scared of new words, keeps them from adopting new tech and services. #momo
Phew.....v toasty at momo.
Sir Terry on why he's quitting Eurovision....http://is.gd/aGTU It's become a farce over the yrs but Terry was always a laugh
New season of Flight o Conchords online premiere http://bit.ly/znIo - US only so need to download Hotspotshield http://bit.ly/4je8
#tcuk after party happening at the east rooms on tabernacle. :-) come and join in if u think u've got the liver :-)
RT @mashable: "OPEN WEB AWARDS: People’s Choice Winners ( http://tinyurl.com/5wva6b )" - Hubdub (client) runners up in social news category.
Empire does shot-by-shot breakdown of the Wolverine trailer http://bit.ly/utd4
Hubdub's New Yr Pundit Awards – Get recognition 4 prediction that seemed crazy at start of 08, but came up roses http://bit.ly/QqHU (client)
RT @Pocketlint: NEWS: Credit Crunch Christmas: Xbox 360 Arcade http://tinyurl.com/55qba6. Xbox 360 Arcade under £100 at Zavvi......nice!
RT @Documentally: "..and the winner for best viral is.. http://tinyurl.com/64hhwb " V good, elements of electro Flight o' Conchords
Shocking news....http://bit.ly/RxXn Now even hugs are used in devious ways...who'd have thought it would come to this....it's a sad day.
17:02 to Guilford from Waterloo cancelled due to lack of drivers. Get u'r act together South West trains.
Good article from Strand Consult on why the iPhone is an operator's worst friend...http://is.gd/bKht - Makes for a good read.
So....full.....can't......move. Must stretch....to.....red....wine...I reckon this must be what athletes feel when training. Just...1...more
Been a good start to Christmas, my awesome gf gave me a fantastic present....welcome to the world of xbox neil :-) Merry Christmas everyone!
Bar golf for a friend's 21st....down a pint of Guinness?? Sacreligious!!!
Unfortunately this is the only shot of #mewhensmall i can find atm. Like most of my report cards: "Good, but could do better..."
What's your favourite xmas film? Agree with Empire http://bit.ly/sXNY but special mentions - Nightmare b4 xmas & Home Alone.
Fire's on, film's on, large drop of Jamesons in hand......don't think i'm moving for a while.
Saga FAIL. Nan's house ins due on 25/12. They sent back a perfectly good cheque, of course it's her fault if it doesn't get 2 them in time!
